# A chatbot for your workflow

Whatever language you prefer, `maitred` understands.

# Installation (Ubuntu)

Download [maitred-0.1.tar.gz](https://github.com/downloads/maitred/maitred/maitred-0.1.tar.gz). Then, in the terminal (in the same directory as the downloaded tar file):

```bash
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install python3 python3-setuptools
sudo easy_install3 maitred-0.1.tar.gz
```

# Quick Start

Download the [sample.cfg](https://gist.github.com/raw/4230167/0facfea3ad094b6eed523a4a35725afa826099eb/sample.cfg) and [pingpong.sh](https://gist.github.com/raw/4230180/48e0f3026682cc7e8d684839c3d53222e726c154/pingpong.sh) executable. In the same directory, run:

```bash
maitred sample.cfg
```

Check the `#maitredtest` channel on `irc.freenode.net` for the `maitredtest` user, which should reply to any "ping" with a simple "pong" response.
